basics.name: Shirmond Conway
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: A motivated individual who gets things done.

work.summary: Software Developer Level 3 engaging in Technical Lead responsibilities.
highlights: Implement Web API Azure Cloud Service layer using OData as part of a Scrum team
Create Remote Catpure to ERP Integration solution using WCF Services
Develop ASP.NET MVC 3 Program Manager application that allowed data entry of Broadcast and Marketing users for the Enjoying Everyday Life TV program
Implement the PayPal Payflow Pro API during migration of Canadian payment provider to utilize tokenization for PCI Compliance
Implemented the ASP.Net MVC/LINQ to SQL/WCF “Online Quoting” solution to allow customers to purchase Vehicle Service Contracts online
Created SQL Server Views, Tables, and Stored Procedures to import Customer, Quoting, and Payment information from the “Online Quoting” solution to the “AGC” application
Created Microsoft SSIS packages that formatted and exported flat files for transferring data to various Administrators, Financial stakeholders, and Marketing Agencies

references.name: Nicholas Cloud
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
